TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现进度栏控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可以用于呈现具有操作系统的当前视觉样式的进度栏控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a progress bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这很有用，如果您正在绘制应具有的当前的视觉样式的外观的自定义控件。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制一个进度栏，使用或方法要绘制的空栏，然后使用或方法来绘制填充的栏中的元素。To draw a progress bar, use the or methods to draw the empty bar, and then use the or methods to draw the elements that fill in the bar. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，此类的方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的进度栏。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the progress bar with the current visual style. 否则，方法与此类属性会引发。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类包装的功能设置为其中一个元素由公开， ， ，和类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the , , , and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件和方法来绘制垂直的进度栏。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a vertical progress bar. 该控件使用重绘每秒的通过添加段的进度栏。The control uses a to redraw the progress bar with an added piece each second. `SetupProgressBar`方法使用和属性来计算绘制每个逐渐变大矩形的高度。The `SetupProgressBar` method uses the and properties to calculate the height of each progressively larger rectangle that is drawn. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

public: static property int ChunkSpaceThickness { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取进度栏每个内部格之间的间距的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

value.span: 进度栏每个内部格之间的间距的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值由操作系统的当前视觉样式确定。This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 在之前访问此属性，你应验证属性返回`true`。Before accessing this property, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定每个矩形大小表示绘制的进度栏的递增方法。The following code example uses the property to determine the size of each rectangle that represents an increment of the progress bar drawn by the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

span.span: Draws a set of progress bar pieces that fill a horizontal progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏格延长的高度`bounds`参数。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the height of the `bounds` parameter. 进度栏格绘制数由的宽度`bounds`和返回的值和属性。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the width of `bounds` and the values returned by the and properties. 使用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏格跨越的宽度`bounds`参数。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the width of the `bounds` parameter. 进度栏格绘制数由的高度`bounds`和返回的值和。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the height of `bounds` and the values returned by and . 使用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用中的方法事件处理程序来绘制增加进度栏的每处。The following code example uses the method in a event handler to draw each increment of a progress bar. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 如果用户已在操作系统中启用了视觉样式，并将视觉样式应用于应用程序窗口的工作区，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user has enabled visual styles in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`的方法和属性的此类将引发。If this property is `false`, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是调用方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to call the method. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
